item.title: Nation's largest fleet of police Cybertrucks to patrol Las Vegas
item.description: The nation’s largest police fleet of Tesla Cybertrucks is set to begin patrolling the streets of Las Vegas in November

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 02-26-43-44-62, Powerball: 22

item.title: US carries out new strike in Caribbean, killing 3 alleged drug smugglers
item.description: The U.S. military has carried out another lethal strike on alleged drug smugglers in the Caribbean Sea

item.title: Video shows immigration agent punching restrained man after car collision turns into confrontation
item.description: Police in a Chicago suburb are gathering evidence after a U.S. Border Patrol vehicle crash led to a violent arrest caught on video

item.title: Explosion at Harvard Med School appears to have been intentional, authorities say
item.description: Officers found no additional devices in a sweep of the building, police said.
